name: contaminated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
poisonous or not pure: The infection was probably caused by swimming in contaminated water/water contaminated with sewage. The virus can be transmitted by food containing contaminated meat. See
contaminate

More examplesFewer examplesThe floodwater could become contaminated with sewage.This contaminated land became the site of homes, schools, and shops.Heavily contaminated soil can be returned to healthy soil that can support plant life.
